content: SP Universal diamond blade Premium diamond blade for cutting in different base materials ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- ### FEATURES:Features Dense concentration of high-quality diamonds delivers much faster cutting speed on reinforced concrete Designed for universality on a wide range of materials, even under the toughest conditions Designed to outlast – with large, specially-bonded diamond segments Thick steel core and laser welding technology for maximum reliability and safety Easy re-ordering – scannable QR code on the blade helps you easily re-order new blades, or verify your blade’s intended base material and target tool type Applications Cutting, resizing and reshaping a wide range of mineral construction materials, especially concrete, reinforced concrete, masonry and natural stone For use with all Hilti hand-held diamond cutting tools including angle grinders, electric cutters and gas saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Tool type | Angle grinder, Electric cutter, Gas saw | Base material | Masonry, Natural stone, Concrete, Concrete (reinforced) | Product Class | Premium | Wet or dry operation | Wet and Dry ### ITEMS- 2434598 -
